character.description: Prisoner in Trick Tower, he has 199-year sentence for robbery and murder.

character.name: Sedokan
character.description: Prisoner in Trick Tower, he has 149-year sentence for serial bombings.

character.name: Majitani
character.description: Prisoner in Trick Tower, he has 108-year sentence for multiple crimes, including fraud and blackmail.

character.name: Leroute
character.description: Prisoner in Trick Tower, she has 112-year sentence for illegal gambling and endangered species trafficking.

character.name: Johness
character.description: Prisoner in Trick Tower, he has 968-year sentence for mass murder. He killed 146 people using only his bare hands. His nickname is Johness the Dissector. He was killed by Killua.

character.name: Togari
character.description: Togari was examiner at 286th Hunter Exam and was almost killed by Hisoka. In 287th Hunter Exam, he came to take revenge on Hisoka, but was killed by him.

character.name: Feitan
character.description: Feitan is one of the original members hailing from Meteor City and currently the de facto leader of the Phantom Troupe. He is attired in what one would expect from a bandit — dark clothes partnered with a skullhead scarf that covers his mouth. He seldom speaks, but when he does, it is full of grammatical errors, giving the impression that he is not speaking in his native tongue. During the Phantom Troupe`s fight with Chimera Ants, Feitan reverts to his native language, which was shown with Chinese characters. After Feitan`s victory over Zazan in Meteor City, he is crowned temporary leader of the Phantom Troupe. Feitan`s movements are incredibly fast, being able to leave afterimages of his body. He wields an umbrella that conceals both a sword and a gun that fires out of the tip. His Nen ability is called "Pain Packer: Unforgiven" which transforms the injuries he has received from his enemy into an attack. The more pain he receives, the stronger his attack is. Currently, only "Rising Sun: Burnt by the Sun" has been revealed, a miniature sun that burns anyone around him disregarding even allies, as shown by the rest of the Phantom Troupe fleeing from the scene when he uses this ability. Only Feitan is unaffected by the attack, presumably because of the armor that is formed on him. Nen type: Transmutation Source: Wiki

character.name: Khara
character.description: Khara is a Hunter working as a crew member for the Hunter Association`s ship and a guide for providing information and rules in the fourth phase of the 287th Hunter Examination.

character.name: Gotou
character.description: Gotoh is a butler in service of the Zaoldyeck Family. All contacts from outside goes through him first before reaching the main house. He has been serving the Zaoldyecks for many years and is considered as a trusted butler in care of Killua Zaoldyeck.

character.name: Zebro
character.description: Zebro is one of two groundskeepers at the Zoldyck family`s estate on Kukuroo Mountain. He acts as a gatekeeper in front of the Testing Gate at first glance, but is actually just a janitor that cleans up after Mike after it disposes off intruders.

character.name: Mike
character.description: Mike is the guard dog of the Zaoldyecks. It is an enormous hound who has gone through strict training.

character.name: Kikyo Zaoldyeck
character.description: Kikyo Zaoldyeck is Killua`s mother. She was injured attempting to prevent Killua from running away from home to take the Hunter Exam, although she is proud of Killua for doing so. She seems to be slightly paranoid and is cautious of Killua`s friends. Kikyo is looking forward to Killua excelling in assassination and anticipates that one day, he will continue on with the family business. According to Illumi, Killua is her favorite son. Source: Wiki

character.name: Kanaria
character.description: Kanaria is an apprentice butler of the Zaoldyeck Family. Anyone attempting to pass her post on the estate will be expelled via force.

character.name: Seaquant
character.description: Seaquant, like Zebro, is an employee of the Zaoldyecks that cleans after Mike. He is a former Blacklist Hunter who tried to get into the estate with a hundred men but was all stopped single handedly by Canary; Seaquant was a sole survivor of the ordeal and was under the employment of the Zaoldyecks ever since. Source: hunterxhunter.wikia

character.name: Zeno Zaoldyeck
character.description: Zeno is Silva`s father.

character.name: Silva Zaoldyeck
character.description: Silva is Killua`s father, and a head of Zaoldyeck family. A silent, pensive figure, Killua`s interaction with him seems limited. He allows Killua to go along with Gon on their journey to find his father, but only because he sees it as a crucial step in his development as the future head assassin of the Zaoldyeck family. Source: Wiki

character.name: Zushi
character.description: Zushi is a young boy who studies Shingen-Ryu Kung fu and Nen under the tutelage of Wing, whom Gon and Killua meet in the Heavens Arena. He is a formidable fighter and a prodigy in his own right, said to have skills only 1 out of 100,000 people have. However, he is quickly surpassed by Gon and Killua, who are said to have skills only 1 out of 10,000,000 people have. According to the results of his water divination, Zushi is a Manipulator. Source: Wiki

character.name: Wing
character.description: Wing is an assistant master of the Shingen-Ryu style of Kung Fu whose pupil is Zushi. He meets Gon and Killua at the Heavens Arena and eventually teaches them Nen. Although he initially refuses to train the two (even lying to them about the purpose of Nen), he changes his mind when they advance to the 200th floor of Heavens Arena, realizing they could die or be badly injured by the other Nen users. For the next several months he teaches them the basics of Nen, after which he announces they have passed the secret final requirement for being a Hunter. He does however somewhat fear their immense potential. Wing`s teacher was Biscuit Krueger, who incidentally becomes Gon and Killua`s second teacher. Source: Wiki

character.name: Chrollo Lucilfer
character.description: Chrollo Lucilfer is the founder and leader of the Phantom Troupe. He forms the group with six other homeless children in Meteor City in his youth, thereafter leaving it. The Troupe was joined by more members, in accordance with Chrollo`s idea of a group with exactly thirteen members, including himself. He organizes the Phantom Troupe mainly to commit acts of theft, though it is unknown what the group does with the stolen objects. His Nen ability also allows him to directly steal the abilities of other users of Nen. He led the genocide on Kurapika`s clan, the latter thereafter stalking Chrollo and neutralizing his Nen ability as punishment. Nen type: Specialization Source: Wiki

character.name: Bonolenov
character.description: Bonolenov is covered in bandages and wears boxing gloves. These bandages cover up a large number of holes throughout his body. During the Chimera Ant arc, he was seen fighting with the other members of the Phantom Troupe against the Chimera Ants. His physical power ranks eighth among the Troupe, and he is the thirteenth Troupe member. Bonolenov is a descendant of the Gyudondond, a small wild tribe that was chased out of their lands by development. When males of the Gyudondond tribe reach the age of three, they are circumcised and needles are inserted in various parts of their body. Over time, these needles are replaced with thicker and thicker sticks, and the holes are stabilized with bamboo stalks or stones. Using these holes, Gyudondond males are able to create a variety of sounds. They are called "Bap", the dancing warriors, and fulfill the role of shamans and performers in their tribe. Before combat, they use their bodies to play songs of battle. The Gyudondond believe that the more beautiful a sound that is played, the greater the spirit it can summon. As a member of this clan, Bonolenov possess this as his Nen ability, titled "Batte Le Cantabile". Nen type: Conjuration Source: Wiki

character.name: Franklin Bordeau
character.description: Franklin is very large, with multiple facial scars similar to that of a Frankenstein. His ability is called "Dual Machine Gun", and is capable of shooting countless bullets composed of Nen from his fingers (which he himself modified). Franklin ranks fourth in physical power among the Troupe, and he is among the original members hailing from Meteor City. Nen type: Emission Source: Wiki

character.name: Kortopi
character.description: Very little is known about Kortopi. Exceptionally short in stature, he also has a thick and messy mane of hair covering his entire head, obscuring everything except for an occasional glimpse of his left eyeball. He is the weakest in the Troupe in terms of raw physical power. In fact, his Nen abilities so far suggest that he is not involved in combat at all, but rather theft and subterfuge. His Nen ability is called "Gallery Fake: Divine Left Hand, Demonic Right Hand", which allows him to make perfect copies of any object by touching it with his left hand and producing the copy with his right. The size of the object doesn`t matter. He can also make copies of living humans, but they`ll be immobile and lifeless. He`s also able to know the exact location of any copy he has created by touching the original object. The copies vanish after 24 hours have passed. Nen type: Conjuration Source: Wiki

character.name: Machi Komachine
character.description: Machi is incredibly loyal to Chrollo, and is one of the original Phantom Troupe members from Meteor City. Hisoka seems to have an occasional interest in her, although it is hard to see whether it is genuine. Her ability is to form aura into thread, the strength of which is inversely proportional to its length: a thread as long as the diameter of the Earth would be as strong as cotton, but a one meter-long thread can lift a ton. Besides attacking it can be used to track people, but was also shown used to stitch severed limbs back on. Physically, she is the strongest woman in the Troupe and the sixth strongest overall. She also has an extremely keen intuition (the other members of the Troupe say that she has never been wrong about her intuitions). Nen type: Transmutation Source: Wiki

character.name: Nobunaga Hazama
character.description: Nobunaga Hazama has a similar appearance to ronin warriors in Edo period Japan, complete with a long katana that he uses with great finesse and skill. Nobunaga specializes in combining Nen with the use of his katana in executing enemies. His best friend is Uvogin, and the two bring out the best of each other during combat. Seeing some of Uvogin`s personality in Gon, he expresses interest in having Gon join the Troupe, though Gon adamantly refuses. Nobunaga ranks ninth in physical power among the Troupe, and is one of the original members from Meteor City. Nen type: Enhancement Source: Wiki

character.name: Phinks Magcub
character.description: Phinxs uses his hands in battle, which has been shown to be extremely powerful. He is one of the original Phantom Troupe members from Meteor City and wears an Egyptian Pharaoh-like outfit in battle. Phinxs seems to get along best with Feitan, and is almost always seen partnered with him both in and out of combat. His Nen ability is called "Ripper Cyclotron", the strength of which is dependent upon how many times he rotates his arm; the more rotations, the more powerful his attack will be. In terms of physical strength, Phinxs is ranked second among the Troupe members. His name is an anagram for "Sphinx". Nen type: Enhancement Source: Wiki

character.name: Shalnark Ryuusei
character.description: Shalnark is member number six of the Phantom Troupe, and from his appearance, he seems to be a normal boy. However, he is one of the most intelligent and quick-thinking members in the group, being highly adept at using computers and information gathering. Shalnark is also a licensed Hunter, so he has access to certain information that could be potentially useful to the Phantom Troupe. His main ability revolves around remotely manipulating the actions of others using his cell phone by sticking a specialized antenna into their bodies. His secondary ability involves applying the antenna upon himself and putting his body on autopilot, resulting in an enhanced state with enough power to devastate most opponents. However, he dislikes this ability because he is subject to immense muscle pain for several days after its use, and as he has no control over the process and retains no memory over what has transpired he can`t derive any pleasure or satisfaction when he uses it to win a fight. Shalnark ranks tenth in physical power among the Troupe. Nen type: Manipulation Source: Wiki

character.name: Shizuku Murasaki
character.description: Shizuku is extremely forgetful and can be an airhead at times which, along with her unassuming appearance, can cause opponents to underestimate her combat abilities. Shizuku uses her Nen vacuum "Blinky" ("Deme-chan" in the original Japanese version) in combat, which is able to suck up anything that is not nen created or that she considers living. It is also able to regurgitate the last thing sucked up. She is left-handed, and the twelfth strongest physically out of the thirteen members of the Troupe. Shizuku is member number eight, a replacement for the last member since the Troupe came together. Nen type: Conjuration Source: Wiki

character.name: Pakunoda
character.description: Pakunoda is an original member of the Phantom Troupe from Meteor City. She is fully loyal to Chrollo, even going against the Troupe in order to help him. She is killed by Kurapika`s Judgement Chain in the climax of the Phantom Troupe arc by violating the restrictions placed upon her. Her main nen ability is to read the memories of people she touches by making specific questions. Her secondary ability allows her to transform these memories into the shape of a bullet which she fires into the heads of her companions from a gun, thereby giving them that information. Pakunoda is buried in the Troupe`s Yorknew hideout. She is eleventh in physical strength. Nen type: Specialization Source: Wiki

character.name: Uvogin
character.description: Uvogin was one of the original members of the Troupe from Meteor City. Out of all of the Phantom Troupe, he was the strongest in terms of raw physical power. Uvogin was so strong, that direct hits from bullets, sniper bullets, and even anti-tank rockets don`t do visible damage to him. Like all of the Troupe, he never hesitates to kill, and particularly enjoys combat against skilled opponents. Although he prefers to fight alone, Uvogin becomes stronger when fighting with a partner, usually Nobunaga, because he fights better when there is someone else to protect (although he never admits this). Seeking revenge on Kurapika for capturing him after his battle with the Shadow Beasts, Uvogin tracks him to the hotel where Neon Nostrade and the rest of her bodyguards are staying. They fight one-on-one in a small canyon on the outskirts of Yorknew City. Kurapika eventually captures Uvogin with his Chain Jail, and questions him about the location and abilities of the other Phantom Troupe members. Uvogin refuses to answer any questions, responding only with "Kill me." Kurapika then pierces Uvogin`s chest with the Judgement Chain ability, giving Uvogin the condition that he must answer all questions truthfully. Kurapika once again asks him the location of the other Troupe members, to which Uvogin only smiles and says to Kurapika "Go to hell, you bastard." Kurapika`s Judgement Chain pierces Uvogin`s heart, instantly killing him. Uvogin is buried by Kurapika at the site of their battle. He was the eleventh member of the Troupe. Nen type: Enhancement Source: Wiki

character.name: Kastro
character.description: Kastro is a prominent and talented fighter in the Heavens Arena. He hang out on the 200th floor of the Heavens Arena with the intent on building enough wins to become a Floor Master. His only loss is to Hisoka, so he trains rigorously to improve his Nen. After accumulating nine out of the ten required wins to become a Floor Master, he challenges Hisoka to a rematch. While he appears to have the upper hand at first, Hisoka realizes that Kastro has been working in tandem with a doppelgänger created through his Nen.[48] Hisoka then performs an illusion using Nen to throw off Kastro, which leaves an opening for Hisoka to kill him. Source: Wiki

character.name: Senritsu
character.description: Senritsu (Melody) is an Music Hunter and is the kind and understanding member of Neon`s bodyguards. She is always ready to listen to anyone`s confessions and has the gift to make people open up to her. As Leorio notes, she is one of the very few characters who has made Kurapika open up to her. Melody`s physical appearance is in short contrast to her kind soul. Due to effects of the "Sonata of Darkness", a musical piece said to have been written by Satan himself and possibly inspired by the Devil`s Trill Sonata, her body is a short and her face disfigured. However, she was not always like this; she was once a normal person. She was transformed when she and a friend listened to the Sonata of Darkness. It is composed of four parts: piano, violin, flute, and harp, and it is said that whomever listens to it will be greatly cursed. Melody`s goal is to find the sonata and destroy it. Melody has the ability to emit her aura to people to soothe ease fatigue when she plays an instrument. She also has a very sharp sense of hearing and can tell a person`s psychological state just by listening to their heartbeat. For example, she knows when people are lying or when someone has completely lost his/her temper. Source: Wiki

character.name: Squala
character.description: Squala is one of Neon Nostrade`s bodyguards. During the job interview for new hires, he was one of the two moles planted alongside the applicants in order to test their strength. Although Squala has been one of Neon`s bodyguards for many years, he does not have a Hunters License. He is also in a romantic relationship with Eliza, one of Neon`s female attendants. Squala is later beheaded by Nobunaga. His nen ability gives him the capacity of manipulating dogs, being able to communicate with them through whistles and give them complex orders, such as guarding or spying.

character.name: Veize
character.description: Veize is one of Neon Nostrade`s new bodyguards, hired along with Kurapika. She is one of the three bodyguards sent to buy what Neon wants in the Yorknew City underground auction, but everyone is consequentially murdered by the Phantom Troupe that night. She is killed by Shizuku during the massacre. Her nen ability is called "Instant Lovers: 180-Minute Love Slave", which gives her the ability to make anyone she kisses her slave for 180 minutes. Her name comes from the French name for a kiss, baiser. Source: Wiki

character.name: Bashou
character.description: Bashou is one of Neon Nostrade`s new bodyguards, hired along with Kurapika. When he is first introduced he is quick to underestimate Kurapika, but after Kurapika`s display of his `Dowsing Chain`, he grows respect for him. His nen ability is called "Great Haiku: The Wandering Haiku Poet", wherein Basho writes a haiku describing a condition on a piece of paper (such as "Anything I hit will explode"), which then comes true, but only if the haiku is good. Source: Wiki

character.name: Dalzollene
character.description: Dalzollene is a leader of Neon Nostrade`s bodyguards and Kurapika`s direct superior. His weapon is a katana inscribed with runes that increase its power when infused Nen. In the anime, he manages to pierce Uvogin by 5 millimeters with the katana. He appears to enjoy music and is dedicated to his job. He also is not hesitant to sacrifice three of Neon`s bodyguards when he predicts Troupe activity at the Yorknew Underground Auction. He has developed his Ten so that he can defend himself from ten bullets. He is later killed by Phinks, as the Phantom Troupe infiltrates a Nostrade compound in order to rescue a captured Uvogin. Source: Wiki

character.name: Shachmono Tocino
character.description: Shachmono Tocino is one of Neon Nostrade`s bodyguards. During the job interview for new hires, he was one of the two moles planted alongside the applicants in order to test their strength. His Nen ability allows him to project human size creations, which he can give simple orders.

character.name: Neon Nostrade
character.description: Neon Nostrade is the only daughter of the head of the Nostrade family, Light Nostrade. She has the ability to predict the future through her fortune tellings which are always accurate, but are slightly cryptic due to their use of abstract references to events. Neon appears in the story when Kurapika interviews for a position among her bodyguards. Neon is spoiled; she receives everything she demands by threatening to cease the use of her ability for her father`s benefit. Neon is also very involved with the occult and is an avid collector of rare human flesh, such as the Scarlet Eyes of the Kurta Clan. Neon cares very little about anything else other than her collection; even the death of her head bodyguard, Dalzollene, causes her no grief. However, when Eliza, a family attendant, is heartbroken, Neon agrees to leave Yorknew City, despite not having obtained the auction items she desired. She loses her ability to Chrollo. Source: Wiki

character.name: Light Nostrade
character.description: Father of Neon, and head of Nostrade Mafia family. The Nostrade Family was originally a minor provincial Mafia family (subordinates of Ritz family) of little importance, but by shrewdly using the fortune telling ability of his daughter Neon, Light Nostrade managed to greatly increase his position in the Mafia Community, to the point where even the Ten Dons seek his daughter`s advice.

character.name: Ivlenkov
character.description: Ivlenkov is one of Neon Nostrade`s bodyguards. He is one of the three bodyguards sent to buy what Neon wants in the Yorknew City underground auction, but everyone is consequentially murdered by the Phantom Troupe that night.

character.name: Shadow Beasts
character.description: The Shadow Beasts are a special group consisting of the 10 most powerful Nen users within the Mafia organizations in the world. Under the direct command of the "Ten Dons," supreme leaders of the Mafia, every beast has his own code name that derives from the animal which inspired him to develop his Nen abilities.

character.name: Tsezguerra
character.description: Tsezguerra is an experienced Money Hunter and 1-Star Hunter. He is hired by Battera to beat Greed Island and also tests the people who want to enter Greed Island in order to earn the 50 Billion prize money. He and his team ally with Gon, Killua, Biscuit, Hisoka and Goreinu to take part in the dodgeball game against Razor. He and his team later engage Genthru`s in a game of chase in order to buy time for Gon to train against Genthru`s "Little Flower" ability and for Killua to heal his injuries. Source: Wiki

character.name: Goreinu
character.description: Goreinu is a Greed Island player who allies with Gon`s party in the dodgeball game against Razor. His Nen ability is to form 2 gorillas out of his Nen. He seems to control the gorillas and can quickly swap the position of them with his own or also with someone other, friend or foe. He later joins Tsezguerra`s team and is the one who gives Gon, Killua, and Biscuit the remaining cards needed to win Greed Island. Source: Wiki

character.name: Razor
character.description: Razor is one of the Gamemasters and a creator of Greed Island. Razor was entrusted by Gon`s father that he was not to hold back against his son should he ever comes to Greed Island. Razor is a key person in getting one of the hardest designated card of the game. To get the card, the challengers must confront Razor and his 14 devils in a group of 15 people, and defeat them in different sporting events. It is learned that the 14 devils were not his allies, but Razor`s own ability to emit 14 Nen creatures at will. He is defeated in a dodgeball game by Gon`s allied party (consisting of Gon, Killua, Biscuit, Hisoka, and several other hunter/players hired by Battera). Razor later reveals to Gon that he was formerly a convict captured by Ging and brought to the island as a prisoner. Inspired by Ging`s spirit, Razor helped him create Greed Island and became the warden for the convicts. He also became one of Ging`s friends and was entrusted to look after the island as one of its Gamemasters. Source: Wiki

character.name: Chimera Ants
character.description: Chimera ants are species of insect, extremely dangerous and ranked first among insects that should be quarantined. They have voracious appetites and can consume several times their own weight within a single day. Chimera ant queens possess an entirely unique method of reproduction, known as phagogenesis, a fictional term describing the process by which chimera ants reproduce—through eating. By eating other creatures, a chimera ant queen imparts the characteristics the ingested creatures onto the next generation of chimera ants it gives birth to. To take advantage of the genes of a particular species, chimera ants have been known to feed until the fodder species is driven to extinction. After tasting humans, the ants focus their efforts on gathering humans. This leads to them learning nen, which increases their strength, but also forms conflict, as their "past memories" as humans causes them to strive for individuality.

character.name: Palm Siberia
character.description: Palm turned to Chimera Ant by Pitou and Pouf.

character.name: Zodiacs
character.description: The Zodiacs are a group of twelve hunters that have been recognized by Chairman Isaac Netero. They each have a codename associated with one of the Chinese zodiac signs, which most of them chose to match in appearance out of adoration for Netero.

character.name: Gyro
character.description: Founder and former leader of NGL.

episode.title: タビダチ×ト×ナカマタチ
Departure x and x Friends
Un départ et des amis
Tabidachi x to x Nakama-tachi
episode.summary: Gon, a 12-year-old boy, fulfills his promise to Mito-san, the woman who raised him, in order to receive permission to set out on a journey to take the Hunter exam and become a Hunter like his father was. While sailing to the examination site, Gon meets Leorio and Kurapika, who are also trying to become Hunters. But the three of them get off to a rocky start... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: シケン×ノ×シケン
Test x of x Tests
L`épreuve de l`épreuve
Shigen x no x Shigen
episode.summary: Gon, Leorio, and Kurapika have arrived at the city where the exam will be held. They follow the captain`s advice and head for a shortcut to the exam site. On the way, they pass through a slum where a group of old ladies are waiting for them. The ladies tell them that they must pass their quiz or be disqualified from the Hunter exam. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ライバル×ガ×サバイバル
Rivals x for x Survival
Il faut se battre pour y arriver !
Rival x ga x Survival
episode.summary: The Kiriko have brought our three heroes to the exam site. Many applicants have already arrived. There`s the veteran Tonpa, the creepy-looking Hisoka, the talkative ninja Hanzo, and the boy with the skateboard Killua. The first phase of the exam is finally about to begin. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: イガイ×ナ×カダイ
A x Surprising x Challenge
Une épreuve étonnante
Igai x na x Kadai
episode.summary: After a scuffle with Hisoka, Gon and his friends are able to safely make it to the site for the second phase of the exam. The examiners for the second phase are Menchi and Buhara. Their task is a cooking test. The applicants struggle to create a dish that satisfies the Gourmet Hunter Menchi. Will anyone be able to make something that satisfies Menchi...? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヒソカ×ハ×ヒソカ
Hisoka x Is x Sneaky
Hisoka est sournois
Hisoka x wa x Hisoka
episode.summary: The applicants made it through the long underground tunnel to find themselves in a foggy wetland. The applicants can barely see a thing as they are targeted by many monsters. Gon and Killua are running near the front of the group, while Leorio and Kurapika are in the back, which is when they spot a group of applicants surrounding Hisoka. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: キボウ×ト×ヤボウ
Hope x and x Ambition
Espoirs et ambitions
Kibou x to x Yabou
episode.summary: The first phase of the exam is to follow the examiner Satotz to the second phase of the exam. A number of applicants have dropped out from the tedious trek that has no end in sight. Leorio is running with Kurapika and starting to lose steam, but then his desire to become a Hunter kicks in again. After running 80 kilometers, they reach a flight of stairs. Satotz picks up the pace again... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヒコウセン×ノ×ケッセン
Showdown x on the x Airship
Combat décisif à bord du dirigeable
Hikousen x no x Kessen
episode.summary: After Gon and his friends successfully passed the second phase of the exam, they boarded the airship which would take them to the third phase. Gon and Killua are exploring the airship when they run into Netero, who proposes a very simple game. All they have to do is take a ball away from Netero and they can become hunters. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ゴンヨリ×ノ×タヨリ
Letter x from x Gon
Des nouvelles de Gon
Gon yori x no x Tayori
episode.summary: Gon writes a letter to Mito-san and Grandma detailing his journey from home to the latest challenge at Trick Tower. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: サイゴ×ノ×カクゴ
Last x Test of x Resolve
Un dernier choix pour la route
Saigo x no x Kakugo
episode.summary: The five group members take different approaches to their fifty hour penalty. Once they`re allowed to return to the test, they must overcome many more obstacles. Eventually, they arrive before two doors with one hour left. One door leads to a long and difficult path that allows five people to pass. The other door leads to a short and easy path that only allows three people to pass. How will the five members vote on this decision...? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ギャンブル×デ×トラブル
Trouble x with the x Gamble
Un pari de maboul
Gamble x de x Trouble
episode.summary: Leorio is in a gambling showdown with their remaining time limit on the line. Soon enough, Leorio only has 10 hours remaining. With no room for error, Leorio turns to a bet involving rock, paper, scissors. Leorio was confident going in, but he falls to his opponent`s mind games. Two wins, two losses. The group is in a tight spot and their fate rests upon Killua. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヒッカケ×ノ×キッカケ
Trick x to the x Trick
L`occasion fait le larron
Hikkake x no x Kikkake
episode.summary: Gon and Kurapika have won their matches, giving the group a 2-1 lead, but their opponents claim that Majitani is only unconscious, so Kurapika`s match hasn`t been settled. Leorio grows impatient with Kurapika, who refuses to finish the job. The five members begin to bicker as time ticks away... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: シュウジン×ニ×ゴヨウジン
Beware x of x Prisoners
Attention aux prisonniers
Shuujin x ni x Goyoujin
episode.summary: Gon and his friends must win three out of the next four rounds. The second round is a game to see whose candle is extinguished first. However, Gon`s candle was tampered with. Next, Kurapika finds himself in a deathmatch against the serial killer Majitani. However, Majitani soon reveals a spider tattoo on his back, the symbol of the Phantom Troupe... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: カイケツ×ハ×タスウケツ?
Decision x by x Majority?
La majorité l`emporte ?
Kaiketsu x wa x Tasuuketsu?
episode.summary: The airship arrives at the top of Trick Tower, the site for the third phase of the exam. The applicants must reach the bottom within 72 hours to pass. Gon, Killua, Kurapika, and Leorio finally discover a way into the tower. However, they need five members before they can progress any further. Who will be the fifth person...? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ターゲット×ニ×ヒット
Hit x the x Target
Toucher la cible
Target x ni x Hitto
episode.summary: The applicants head to Zevil Island for the fourth phase of the exam. Each person draws a number which corresponds to the ID number of their target. The ID tag of their target is worth 3 points, their own ID tag is worth 3 points, and all other ID tags are worth 1 point. Each applicants must collect 6 points in order to pass this phase of the exam. Gon`s target turns out to be... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アナ×デ×ワナ
Trap x in the x Hole
Piège dans la grotte
Ana x de x Wana
episode.summary: Killua grows tired of having Imori shadowing him so he challenges Imori to a fight and quickly dispatches him. Meanwhile, Gon has joined up with Leorio and Kurapika. The three of them devise a plan for taking Ponzu`s tag and track her down to a suspicious-looking cave. That is when Leorio insists on heading in alone. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ハイボク×ト×クツジョク
Defeat x and x Disgrace
Défaite et humiliation
Haiboku x to x Kutsujoku
episode.summary: Kurapika and Leorio are being stalked by Hisoka, but they managed to negotiate their way out of a fight. However, the encounter leaves Hisoka aroused, so he leaves in search of a new target. Gon is able to use his fishing rod to snatch Hisoka`s tag right when Hisoka attacks his target. However, as Gon tries to escape, he is attacked by another applicant and loses his tag... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ダマシアイ×ノ×トリアイ
Explosion x of x Deception
Tromperies à la chaîne
Damashiai x no x Toriai
episode.summary: Gon is relying on Bloodcrazy Butterflies to find his target, Hisoka, before waiting for the perfect time to use his skill with the fishing rod to snatch Hisoka`s tag. Meanwhile, Leorio is tricked by Tonpa and loses his own tag, but Kurapika helps him recover it. Now that Kurapika and Leorio know that neither is the other`s target, they decided to form an alliance. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: タイセツ×ナ×メンセツ
Big x Time x Interview
Un entretien décisif
Taisetsu x na x Mensetsu
episode.summary: Gon and his friends have been trapped inside a cave by poisonous snakes. Bourbon, the person responsible for the trap, is already dead, and nobody knows how to disarm the trap. Meanwhile, Leorio, who was bitten by the snakes, is growing weak. Gon manages to get them out of the sticky situation and through to the final phase of the exam. But first, Netero wants an interview with each of the remaining applicants... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: カテナイ×ガ×マケナイ
Can`t Win x and x Can`t Lose
Victoire impossible, défaite impossible
Katenai x ga x Makenai
episode.summary: Gon and his friends have advanced to the final phase of the Hunter Exam. The final phase is a tournament where the winners are out and the losers advance. The rule is that if you kill your opponent, you`ll be disqualified. The first mach is Gon versus Hanzo. Gon can`t do anything against Hanzo, but he refuses to give up. Hanzo is losing his patience and threatens to break Gon`s arm. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: フカカイ×ナ×テンカイ
Baffling x Turn of x Events
Un développement inattendu
Fukakai x na x Tenkai
episode.summary: After breaking his arm in the fight against Hanzo, Gon wakes up in a bed and is immediately congratulated by Satotz for passing the Hunter Exam. He then informs Gon that Killua has failed. Gon is incredulous as Satotz tells him what happened when Killua faced off against his brother Illumi. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: キョウダイ×ノ×モンダイ
Some x Brother x Trouble
Querelles fraternelles
Kyoudai x no x Mondai
episode.summary: Gon is upset that Killua was forced to kill. Gon is mad at Illumi and proclaims that he will go to Kukuroo Mountain to rescue Killua. As Gon and his friends depart, Satotz mentions that the Hunter Exam isn`t over yet... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 潘めぐみ·伊瀬茉莉也のHUNTER×HUNTER HUNTER STUDIO 第1回
Han Megumi and Ise Mariya`s Hunter x Hunter Hunter Studio 1
Han Megumi, Ise Mariya no Hunter x Hunter Hunter Studio Dai 1 Kai
潘めぐみ·伊瀬茉莉也のHUNTER×HUNTER HUNTER STUDIO 第2回
Han Megumi and Ise Mariya`s Hunter x Hunter Hunter Studio 2
Han Megumi, Ise Mariya no Hunter x Hunter Hunter Studio Dai 2 Kai
潘めぐみ·伊瀬茉莉也のHUNTER×HUNTER HUNTER STUDIO 第3回
Han Megumi and Ise Mariya`s Hunter x Hunter Hunter Studio 3
Han Megumi, Ise Mariya no Hunter x Hunter Hunter Studio Dai 3 Kai
潘めぐみ·伊瀬茉莉也のHUNTER×HUNTER HUNTER STUDIO 第4回
Han Megumi and Ise Mariya`s Hunter x Hunter Hunter Studio 4
Han Megumi, Ise Mariya no Hunter x Hunter Hunter Studio Dai 4 Kai
キケン×ナ×バンケン
A x Dangerous x Watchdog
Un dangereux chien de garde
Kiken x na x Banken
episode.summary: After arriving in the Republic of Podokea, Gon, Leorio, and Kurapika board a tour bus to Kukuroo Mountain, where Killua lives. However, they`re blocked by a massive gate. Anyone who attempts to enter through the side door is eaten by the watchdog. Gon tells the guard that they are friends of Killua and asks to be let in. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: バンニン×ノ×セキニン
The x Guard`s x Duty
Les devoirs d`un garde
Bannin x no x Sekinin
episode.summary: Gon and his friends have decided to pass through the Trial Gate to see Killua. First, they must train in the servants` residence until they can open the gate. Meanwhile, Killua has learned that Gon and the others are here to see him. Gon, Leorio, and Kurapika are able to open the gate after completing their training, but the apprentice butler Canary stands in their way. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ゾルディック×ノ×カゾク
The x Zoldyck x Family
La famille Zoldik
Zoldyck x no x Kazoku
episode.summary: With help from Canary, who is concerned about Killua, Gon and his friends are getting closer to the mansion. However, Kikyo tells them that Killua cannot see them as he is in solitary confinement. Meanwhile, Killua has been summoned by Silva and asked if he wants to see his friend? Killua answers truthfully, and he is allowed to go see his friends... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ミエナイ×ト×アエナイ
Can`t See x If x You`re Blind!
Tu ne le verras pas si tu ne la vois pas
Mienai x to x Aenai
episode.summary: Canary guides Gon and his friends to the butler office. There, they meet the butler Goto, who challenges them to a coin game so he can determine if they are worthy of being Killua`s friends. After winning the game and reuniting with Killua, Gon now looks ahead to his next objective... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アレカラ×ト×ソレカラ
Then x and x After
Avant et après
Are kara x to x Sore kara
episode.summary: A letter from Gon arrives at Whale Island for Mito... (A recap of everything that has happened.) Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ジン×ト×ゴン
Ging x and x Gon
Gin et Gon
Ging x to x Gon
episode.summary: After learning Nen and becoming a true Hunter, Gon returns to Whale Island with Killua. When he arrives, Mito has a box for him. She was told by Ging to give this box to Gon once he became a Hunter. However, it appears that the box cannot be opened. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: オオキナカリ×ト×チイサナケリ
A Big Debt x and x a Small Kick
Une énorme dette et un petit coup de pied
Ookina Kari x to x Chiisana Keri
episode.summary: After landing a punch on Hisoka, Gon returns the tag from the Hunter Exam. Hisoka is ecstatic to see Gon`s development and uses his own Nen to attack. Gon is scared, but he recklessly continues to attack! Will he emerge victorious? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: セイカク×ナ×ゴウカク
The x True x Pass
Examen véritablement réussi
Seikaku x na x Goukaku
episode.summary: Gon and Killua begin training in Hatsu, the culmination of everything they`ve learned about Nen. And finally, Gon challenges Hisoka to return the favor from the Hunter Exam. "I`m going to give the tag back to Hisoka while punching him in the face!" Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ジツリョク×デ×セツジョク
Power x to x Avenge
Revanche à armes égales
Jitsuryoku x de x Setsujoku
episode.summary: Gon has fights against Gido and Riehlvelt coming up. He`s still mad about what they did to Zushi. Gon is able to withstand Gido`s attacks and overwhelm him in battle. This causes Hisoka to smile. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ケイハク×ナ×キョウハク
An x Empty x Threat
Une menace insignifiante
Keihaku x na x Kyouhaku
episode.summary: After two months, Gon and Killua are finally allowed to practice Nen again. That`s when Gido, Sadaso, and Riehlvelt appear before them and tell them to fight them in the arena. Gon and Killua refuse, but Killua finds Sadaso`s behavior to be very suspicious. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ドッキリ×ナ×ショウリ
A x Surprising x Win
Une victoire surprenante
Dokkiri x na x Shouri
episode.summary: Kastro has used his ability to create a clone of himself with Nen to sever Hisoka`s arm and take an advantage in the fight. However, despite losing both arms, Hisoka appears to be perfectly calm. Kastro loses his cool and attacks Hisoka. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: インネン×ト×シュウネン
Destiny x and x Tenacity
Destinée et ténacité
Innen x to x Shuunen
episode.summary: A month has passed since Gon was seriously injured, and Hisoka and Kastro are about to fight in Heavens Arena. Kastro was able to knock Hisoka down in the past and sounds very confident in his interview. Hisoka appears unperturbed by the upcoming fight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ゲキトウ×ト×カットウ
Fierce x and x Ferocious
Combat acharné et querelle
Gekitou x to x Kattou
episode.summary: Gon faces the Nen user Gido in his first 200s Heavens Arena match. Gon uses Ten to protect himself, but he soon finds himself on the defense against Gido`s Dancing Tops. As Gon desperately tries to find a way to fight back, he makes a bold decision... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: カクセイ×ト×カノウセイ
Awakening x and x Potential
Éveil et potentiel
Kakusei x to x Kanousei
episode.summary: After reaching the 200th floor, Gon and Killua run into Hisoka`s barrier of Nen. They ask Wing to use the violent method for activating their Nen potential. As the deadline for registration draws near, they begin training in one of the four major principles of Nen, Ten. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ネン×ト×ネン
Nen x and x Nen
Nen et Nen
Nen x to x Nen
episode.summary: As Wing explains the tenants of Nen to the boys, Killua believes that they aren’t being told the whole story. After a meteoric rise from the 1’st floor to the 190’s, they finally get their chance to register for a fight on the 200th floor. But just stepping off the elevator, the murderous intent is unlike anything they have experienced. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: トウギジョウ×ニ×トウジョウ
Arrival x at the x Arena
Entrée dans l`arène
Tougijou x ni x Toujou
episode.summary: Gon and Killua have arrived at Heavens Arena, where opponents get stronger as you ascend the tower, to train and make money. Both of them are immediately advanced to the 50th floor after their initial battles on the 1st floor. There, they meat Zushi. When Killua faces off against Zushi, he has no difficulty at all, until Zushi uses a strange technique reminiscent of what Illumi used... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ゴウケツ×ノ×シュウケツ
Gathering x of x Heroes
Le rassemblement des héros
Gouketsu x no x Shuuketsu
episode.summary: The biggest auction in the world is about to take place in York New City. The Phantom Troupe leader, Chrollo, has instructed the members to gather in the city. For what purpose? The band of murdering thieves is about to make its move. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ノウリョクシャ×ハ×キョウリョクシャ?
Nen x Users x Unite?
Coopération entre utilisateurs de nen
Nouryokusha x wa x Kyouryokusha?
episode.summary: Kurapika and the other job seekers arrive at the home of a human trophy collector and are attacked by a unknown force. As they fight off the assailants, Kurapika is able to identify that one of the group members is behaving suspiciously. Meanwhile, Gon and Killua head for York New City to search for information on Greed Island, the game that may lead them to Ging. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ネガイ×ト×チカイ
Wish x and x Promise
Souhait et serment
Negai x to x Chikai
episode.summary: The Phantom Troupe is Kurapika`s most hated enemy. Five years ago, they took his relatives and friends, along with their scarlet eyes. Kurapika begins his battle to recover his brethren`s eyes and send the Troupe to hell. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: オヤジ×ノ×ヘンジ
Reply x from x Dad
La réponse de mon père
Oyaji x no x Henji
episode.summary: The box left by Ging for Gon contained a cassette tape with a recording of Ging`s voice. However, once the tape was stopped, it erased the message. The only remaining leads are the ring and game memory card left in the box. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ゲキセン×ノ×フクセン
Buildup x to a x Fierce Battle
Vorahnung x eines x heftigen Kampfes
Préparation au combat
Gekisen x no x Fukusen
episode.summary: After Uvogin slaughters the Mafia`s pursuit, the Mafia dispatches their secret weapon, the Shadow Beasts. However, Uvogin is able to defeat them by himself. During the battle, the spider tattoo on Uvogin`s back is revealed, and Kurapika springs to action. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ショウゲキ×ノ×サンゲキ
A x Shocking x Tragedy
Eine x schockierende x Tragödie
Une farce tragique
Shougeki x no x Sangeki
episode.summary: The Phantom Troupe attacks the underground auction held by the Mafia. Afterwards, there is no sign of the merchandise or guests. The Mafia place a reward on their heads and begin pursuit. Kurapika and the other bodyguards on patrol join the pursuit. Kurapika is drawing closer to the Phantom Troupe. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: マモル×ト×セメル
Defend x and x Attack
Défendre et attaquer
Mamoru x to x Semeru
episode.summary: The auction is finally about to begin. Gon, Killua, and Leorio are working hard to amass enough money to buy Greed Island. Kurapika has been assigned to monitor the auction house. Meanwhile, the Phantom Troupe draws close. All paths will soon cross in York New City! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: コウソク×ト×ヤクソク
Restraint x and x Vow
Einschränkung x und x Versprechen
Contrainte et promesse
Kousoku x to x Yakusoku
episode.summary: Kurapika was able to capture Uvogin, a member of the Phantom Troupe. Kurapika struggles to control his rage as Uvogin makes demands as though he isn`t a captive. That is when Kurapika receives an e-mail from Hisoka... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: メキキ×ノ×キキメ
Very x Sharp x Eye
Des yeux bien affutés
Mekiki x no x Kikime
episode.summary: Gon, Killua, and Leorio are trying to get their hands on enough money to buy Greed Island. As they pass through the market, Gon stumbles across a way to identify valuable items. The plan is to buy cheap and sell low, but someone else is bidding on all their items. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: セイヤク×ト×セイヤク
Condition x and x Condition
Beschränkung x und x Schwur
Condition et serment
Seiyaku x to x Seiyaku
episode.summary: Kurapika faces off against the Phantom Troupe member Uvogin in a one-on-one all out battle.

episode.title: オウモノ×ト×マツモノ
Chasing x and x Waiting
Verfolger x und x Wartende
Poursuite et attente
Oumono x to x Matsumono
episode.summary: Uvogin was able to escape with some help from his fellow bandits. However, after the blow to his pride, he is determined to track down Kurapika and defeat him. Kurapika realizes that the Phantom Troupe has identified their location and moves the boss to a safe place while awaiting the Phantom Troupe`s arrival by himself. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ナカマ×ト×カタナ
Ally x and x Sword
Camarades et sabre !
Nakama x to x Katana
episode.summary: Gon and Killua have been captured by the Phantom Troupe. They are questioned about the chain user that the Troupe is searching for, but the two of them don`t know that the chain user is Kurapika. As they`re about to be released, Nobunaga decides to keep them around as potential recruits for the Troupe. Will Gon and Killua be able to escape? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ツイセキ×デ×ブンセキ

Two minutes earlier, two glowing lights descended upon the Republic of East Gorteau. Neferpitou was the first to notice them. "Something`s coming." A few seconds later, Neferpitou`s hunch was confirmed. "The enemy!" A giant dragon drops out of the clouds. The final battle pitting human against Chimera Ant is about to begin. Source: crunchyroll

He soon comes across Killua standing on the wall of the palace with Komugi on his back. Source: crunchyroll

Knuckle is hiding inside the crowd with Melereon waiting nearby while Palm stands by behind the palace and Ikalgo waits above the hallway. All of them grow tense as the King returns. Meanwhile, Pouf`s clones are searching for the Gungi board and pieces which will trigger the return of the King`s memories so he can hide them. Welfin, Brovada, Hina, Shidore, and the other Chimera Ants, some with memories of their previous lives and some without, choose to take different paths. Source: crunchyroll

He is followed by multiple butlers, but Killua does not stop. Will Killua be able to bring Alluka to Gon and save him? Source: crunchyroll

Killua carries Alluka and runs through the forest towards Parasta, but he is followed by a shadowy figure...who turns out to be the butler Tsubone. After Killua puts on a burst of speed to shake Tsubone, she calls her granddaughter Amane who is also a butler and tells her to cut them off. Will Killua be able to reach Gon? Source: crunchyroll

Meanwhile, Hisoka is killing Hunters from the Seirin Group who seek to capture one of the Needlemen and discovers a map which marks where Killua`s airship will land. Illumi has obtained the same map and is in hot pursuit while the butlers Tsubone and Amane are also following the airship. Source: crunchyroll

Gon wants to tell Ging all about his journey so far: about leaving his hometown of Whale Island to find him, about passing the rigorous Hunter Exam and becoming a Pro Hunter, and about all the precious friends he made along the way. Gon`s first experience spending time with Ging as father and son awaits him. Source: crunchyroll

The Ging from the photograph in Mito`s house. The Ging that Satotz, Razor, and Kite spoke of. That Ging is now waving at Gon. Gon runs over to speak to Ging. Source: crunchyroll

The result is that Leorio is in 1st while Pariston is in 2nd. However, Leorio failed to secure 50% of the vote so there will be a final vote between the top two vote-getters. Meanwhile, back in Gon`s hospital, Alluka wakes up after napping on Killua`s lap. Killua makes his forbidden wish to Something. Source: crunchyroll

episode.summary: After the 7th vote for the 13th Hunter Association Chairman, the remaining eight candidates are cut down to four for the next vote. After Ging`s cryptic comment that the outcome is that there is no outcome, Cheadle asks him how to defeat Pariston. Ging`s response is that Pariston doesn`t want to win and doesn`t want to lose, which is what makes him strong. What does he mean? Source: crunchyroll
